titles.title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1875, to permit the State of Colorado to use land held in trust by the State as open space, and for other purposes.
To amend the Act of March 3, 1875, to permit the State of Colorado to use land held in trust by the State as open space, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Amends the Colorado Enabling Act to permit the State of Colorado to use land held in trust by the State for the support of common schools for open space, wildlife habitat, scenic value, or other natural values, with the requirement that any income received from using the land shall be used only for common schools.
